0.1.name: wordpress/auto-ping-booster
0.1.description: Use this plugin to ping your blog, post, pages, images, docs files, on daily basis. Auto Ping Booster will auto Ping your blog in Google Blogsearch after every update. Auto Ping Booster is known about SEO Booster. Just upload auto-ping-booster.zip file to plugin directory or upload it by plugin option in menu and active it. It works automatically itself.
